# WebServiceRequestSettings.CookieManager property

Gets or sets the cookie manager. If [`GetHttpClient`](GetHttpClient.md) is set, then this property is ignored.

```csharp
public CookieManager CookieManager { get; set; }
```

## Property Value

The cookie manager.
